tool.name: Downsample SAM/BAM
tool.description: Down-sample a file to retain a subset of the reads

param.name: inputFile
param.label: SAM/BAM dataset to be downsampled
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM or BAM dataset.

param.name: probability
param.label: Probability (between 0 and 1) that any given read will be kept
param.help: specify 1 to keep all reads, 0.1 to keep 10% of the reads

param.name: seed
param.label: Random seed value
param.help: (same seed + same probability = same set of reads kept)

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
Randomly down-sample a SAM or BAM file to retain a random subset of the reads. Mate-pairs are either both kept or both discarded. Reads marked as not primary alignments are all discarded. Each read is given a probability P of being retained - results with the exact same input in the same order and with the same value for RANDOM_SEED will produce the same results.
@description@
INPUT=File I=File The input SAM or BAM file to downsample. Required.
OUTPUT=File O=File The output, downsampled, SAM or BAM file to write. Required.
RANDOM_SEED=Long R=Long Random seed to use if reproducibilty is desired. Setting to null will cause multiple invocations to produce different results.
PROBABILITY=Double P=Double The probability of keeping any individual read, between 0 and 1.
@more_info@
